item.title: By: pierre
item.dc:creator: pierre
item.description: Rav Amital and Abba Kovner's exchange and the disinterest in Judaism of their generation as the reason for a failed TV program....now we face something so similar, but as phenomena within the Dati world - not simply the "Jewish" world at large, let alone Israel - in all the spheres; the various Orthoprax, skeptics, etc. Viruses strains of unlearned, dilettante and bitter skepticism, desperation and spiritual desolation have infected all the "Jewish" species, leaving none unaltered. Some years ago, R. Amital had written several times on youth at risk and the commitment crisis, "KhaBaKookniks", etc. What would be said about the Dati world now?
